name: spacehackersclub-site
description: The official Space Hackers Club site.
author: Kevin Ridgway <kridgway@gmail.com>

scripts.deploy: git checkout master && git branch -D gh-pages && git checkout -b gh-pages master && git checkout gh-pages && npm run build && git add --all && git commit -m 'Update site.' && git subtree push --force --prefix public origin gh-pages
